name: Oathbreaker
description:
-Synopsis-

A veteran Warlock finds herself in a political conspiracy when she is summoned by the Sovereignty as the new Court Mage.

Is the real danger truly one of political intrigue, or is there a darker secret hiding underneath?

-Main Character-
  • Changable name.
  • 5 different appearances.
  • 3 personality choices.
-Romance Choices- Alwenn:
  • Protective.
  • Loyal.
  • Voice of reason.
King Raelan:
  • The (new) King.
  • Puppy. Bites.
  • Awkwardly(?) clever.
Argandea:
  • Big, strong, blue man.
  • Good at everything. (Except losing)
  • Banter partner
Lea:
  • Slymaster Spymaster.
  • Really tall dwarf.
  • Natural badass.
Virion:
  • Questionable morals.
  • Arrogant asshole.
  • Elven mess.
-Backgrounds-

The group often travels, which allows us to see many different parts of Northern Aradove.

-Side Characters-

Every spoken dialogue has a sprite. Friends, foes, and unlikely allies.

-Animated CGs and Sprites- -Minigames-

-Patreon exclusive NSFW version-

⭐NSFW version with animated & interactive CGs here!⭐

Known issues: If you are stuck during load/save or between scenes, delete your offline website data / browser history and keep your save files to a minimum.(4-6 slots)
If the game doesn't load at all, use a different browser and make sure you are close to your internet/wi-fi source.
Warning: Only works on Chrome, Firefox and Safari. (Some versions of Safari may have sound issues. Most mobile phones won't play sounds at all.)
Take frequent saves without using many slots as it can get stuck loading between scenes.
